h3.a: eLearning Schedule for April and May
YCS Virtual Learning Technology Help Information
A Message From Dr. Hinshaw - Superintendent of Yorktown Community Schools

div.div: Core Beliefs of Yorktown Community Schools:
- Students will learn and perform best when stakeholders maintain high expectations
- Curriculum and instruction will be research or evidence-based with student achievement being measured to ensure continuous progress
- Students will be provided opportunities to learn and achieve to their highest potential
- School leaders will expect and support ongoing improvement of teaching and student performance
